FirstSpeed.description: How much speed the spring will send you off with.

OutOfControl.description: How long the game locks your control for after coming in contact with this object.

KeepVelocityDistance.description: How far away Sonic must travel after coming in contact with this object before he begins to loose speed.

m_IsMonkeyHunting.description: Whether or not the spring should attempt to send Sonic towards the target position.

m_MonkeyTarget.description: The position the spring will attempt to send Sonic towards if IsTargeting is set to true.
